doc:
Ginger Orsi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ginger_Orsi 0 Ginger Orsi (born May 13, 1984 in California) is an American singer and former actress. She is best known for her role as Amanda Phillips on the 1980s sitcom Duet and its subsequent spin-off Open House. She also appeared in the 1994 film The Favor starring Brad Pitt. Her older sister Leigh Ann Orsi also co-starred in that film. Orsi has not acted professionally since then and has since pursued a career in music. In 2009, she released a four-track EP entitled Take a Bath with Me. Ginger_Orsi ( born May_13_,_1984 in California ) is an_American_singer and former_actress . She is_best_known for her_role as Amanda_Phillips on the_1980s_sitcom_Duet and its_subsequent_spin-off_Open_House . She also appeared in the_1994_film The_Favor starring Brad_Pitt . Her_older_sister_Leigh_Ann_Orsi also co-starred in that_film . Orsi has_not_acted professionally since then and has_since_pursued a_career in music . In 2009 , she released a_four-track_EP entitled_Take a_Bath with Me .
